Detailed Description

Provides specific methods for Site table entries

Member Function Documentation

Site::__construct (  BDDRecord $  newRec  ) 
 

Initialises Site from the BDDRecord $newRec. If $newRec is NULL, Variable is empty. Sets IsValid to false.

Parameters:
$newRec a BDDRecord to copy/cast or NULL

Site::Validate (   ) 
 

Tries to validate the Site in order to save it into DataBase.

Returns:
- NULL if object has been validated

- an Errors object in case of error(s) :

SiteError::SITE_NAME_EMPTY if property TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME is empty

Reimplemented from BDDRecord.
